name: anomalously
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is different from what is usual, or not in agreement with something else and therefore not satisfactory: It is anomalously warm for February in Boston. Oil prices seem anomalously low. See
anomaly
More examplesFewer examplesThe waters of the Gulf of Mexico are anomalously deep. The water temperature - anomalously for mid-summer at the beach - is very chilly.The baby made a mess with her dinner, but her shirt was still anomalously clean.
